title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 519.16 - Who may be present at the hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 519.16 - Who may be present at the hearing

State Regulations

The appellant, his/her representative, counsel or other
representative of the department, an interpreter if the appellant does not
speak English or is deaf and an interpreter has been requested, witnesses for
both parties, persons who may be called as witnesses by the hearing officer and
such other persons or members of the public as the hearing officer in his/her
discretion may admit, are entitled to be present at the hearing. Supervisory
staff of the department shall be entitled to observe or to assist the official
representative of the department, as necessary for proper supervision and
evaluation of the performance of the employee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
519.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
